alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Jefferson Davis; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 10:58AM CST until December 23 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Mermentau River Near Mermentau ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mermentau River Near Mermentau. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 4.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding near the river will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CST Monday the stage was 4.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 AM CST Monday was 4.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is in a flat crest and is expected to fall below flood stage Thursday evening and continue falling to 3.9 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Mermentau River Mermentau 4.0 4.1 Mon 10 am CS 4.1 4.1 4.0 &&
